blockAccount.title: Block Account
blockAccount.description: The account represented by this state block

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Amount of Banano sent in this transaction

recipient.title: Recipient
recipient.description: The account that is receiving the transaction

sender.title: Sender
sender.description: The account that sent the transaction

balance.title: Balance
balance.description: Block account balance once this transaction is confirmed

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: The date and time this block was discovered

confirmed.title: Confirmed
confirmed.description: Whether or not this block is confirmed

nextBlock.title: Next Block
nextBlock.description: The next block in this account's chain

prevBlock.title: Previous Block
prevBlock.description: The previous block in this account's chain

link.title: Previous Block
link.description: The previous block in this account's chain

unknownBlock.title: Unknown Block
unknownBlock.description: The block you requested in not found.  Please double-check the hash is correct or try again later.
